name: nativescript-bottom-navigation
description: NativeScript plugin to add a bottom navigation component for Android & iOS

scripts.ngc: npm run ngc.clean && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/.bin/ngc -skipLibCheck -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run ngc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android
scripts.demo-vue.reset: cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-test && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-test && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
